Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    Forestry Inspections

    Forest Restoration Tracking

    These polygons depict areas where invasive plants were removed and native trees and/or shrubs were planted.

    Financial Plan Statements - Revenue

    This dataset shows the revenue for the current fiscal year. Data is reported in millions and updated monthly.

    This dataset shows the revenue and expense obligation forecast for the current fiscal year. Data is reported in millions and updated monthly.
